[dissuade him from genocide]

*You: I thought I might discourage you from bringing about the end of humanity.

*Z: "Ohhh, pleeease, [DON'T KILL THEM!]" So that's what you want? What do YOU know of my plans? WHO ARE YOU?

[I'm a time traveler]

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------

[I'm a time traveler] dissuade_fail_1
[yourself] dissuade_fail_2
